roleset.name: to cut short
roleset.note: ABRIDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'abridge' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from abridge.01-v predicate notes) Member of VN Class other_cos-45.4.

example.name: abridge-v: transitive
example.text: `` The First Amendment proscribes the government from [*-2] passing laws abridging the right to free speech , '' Judge Donald O'Brien ruled [*T*-1].
